data.title: Team Marketing Report
data.meta_description: Roc Nation was founded in 2008 by musician and music producer, Shawn "Jay-Z" Carter, in partnership with Live Nation and is based in Beverly Hills, Calif. Additional offices are located in New York City, Nashville, Tenn,, and London. Roc Nation Sports, a unit of Roc Nation, specializes in athlete representation and marketing. Work includes concepting and executing marketing and endorsement agreements, community outreach, charitable partnerships, media relations and branding strategy. In 2014, Roc Nation Sports launched a full-service boxing promotion division. Roc Nation Sports represents athletes in baseball, basketball, boxing, football and soccer, both active and retired, including . . … Continued
